title: Rick and Morty trailer takes cheeky dig at Doctor Strange in season 4 trailer
text:
To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

Rick and Morty couldn’t resist a cheeky little dig at their fellow time and space traveller Doctor Strange in the latest trailer for the upcoming season 4.

Creators Justin Roiland and Dan Harmon may have upset fans with only five episodes being released when the new season launches in November, but they look like they’re cramming a lot in.

And by that we mean, they’re taking the mick out of everyone and anyone.

Rick and Morty will be back on our screens in no time (Picture: Adult Swim)

In one quick clip, which appears to be at some intergalactic nightclub, Rick whips off his ever-present lab coat and commands it to ‘rip off Doctor Strange’.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Just like the trusty sentient cloak that comes in super handy for Benedict Cumberbatch’s time-manipulator, Rick’s coat flies off and wraps itself around a security guard that’s coming after him and his grandson, Morty.

Eat your heart out, Strange. Never thought I’d see the day where I’d want to see two cloaks go head-to-head in a fight, but there you go.

Time and space travellers go head-to-head (Picture: Rex)

The flyaway (no pun intended) comment comes after work by Dan Harmon on the 2016 was almost totally dismissed by the team for being ‘too out of Harmonland’ to fit the MCU.

While Harmon would later say his efforts on the film was a positive experience after all, we can’t help but feel there was at least some shade going on there.

Rick and Morty seasons 1-3 are available on Channel 4, with season 4’s UK release unconfirmed.

description: The Rick and Morty team couldn't help but take a cheeky little swipe at Benedict Cumberbatch character, Doctor Strange.
